channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: PlayStation Portal Pro : Sony prépare enfin la version OLED que tout le monde attendait
item.description: Selon le leaker Zuby_Tech, une version améliorée, potentiellement nommée PlayStation Portal Pro, serait en préparation avec deux arguments de poids : une dalle OLED et un taux de rafraîchissement de 120 Hz.

item.title: Forget lasers and missiles, China wants to kill drones using a common tech households use everyday in kitchens all around the world — invisible microwave weapons can fry electronics but still require line-of-sight and proximity
item.description: China wants to counter drone swarms using high power microwave weapons similar in principle to household ovens but scaled for military air defense roles.

item.title: The 16 Best EVs Coming in 2026
item.description: We’re expecting fresh electrics from Rivian, Hyundai, Honda, BMW, and newcomer Slate, among others. Here are the EVs arriving this year that we’re most excited about.

item.title: Can't wait for Celebrity Traitors UK season 2? The cast of Agatha Christie's Seven Dials on Netflix is '100%' game to compete — but think it would be 'the worst two weeks of our life'
item.description: We've got The Traitors UK season 4 and Agatha Christie's Seven Dials on the go at once this week – but two of the Netflix cast would 'love' to appear on Celebrity Traitors UK season 2.

item.title: ICYMI: the week's 7 biggest tech stories like Apple losing to Google, and Meta giving up on VR
item.description: The biggest tech news stories from Meta, Amazon, Apple, and more for January 17, 2026.

item.title: Man United vs Man City Free Streams: How to Watch Manchester Derby online as Michael Carrick takes charge of his opening game
item.description: We'll show you how to watch Man United vs Man City live streams from anywhere as Michael Carrick takes charge for the first time since replacing Ruben Amorim.

item.title: What we can learn about U.S. disaster response—a year after the LA wildfires
item.description: Jacob Soboroff’s new book ‘Firestorm’ looks at the systemic failures that helped cause the LA fires—and what we can learn from a year of recovery efforts. One year on from the catastrophic LA wildfires, journalist, author, and MS NOW correspondent Jacob Soboroff examines what the fires reveal about America’s growing age of disaster. Drawing from his new book Firestorm, Soboroff shares hard lessons from the aftermath, exposing systemic failures, unlikely heroics, and what today’s recovery efforts tell us about how the U.S. will respond to the next crisis....

item.title: Meilleur aspirateur robot 2026 : notre sélection et nos avis
item.description: Vous êtes à la recherche d'un bon aspirateur robot pour vous simplifier la vie? Voici notre sélection des meilleurs robots aspirateurs, tous testés et approuvés.

item.title: Data sovereignty: an existential issue for nations and enterprises
item.description: As data sovereignty becomes a board-level priority, how can enterprises contain their risk.

item.title: A 3D printed drone is probably the world's fastest DIY plane ever, quicker than even the legendary P38 Lightning — but at 408mph, it has some way to go to catch up with the 575mph TU-95
item.description: A fully 3D printed drone reaches 408mph and retakes the Guinness World Record for fastest quadcopter ever flown by a DIY team.

item.title: TCL’s PlayCube projector is more fun than a Rubik’s Cube
item.description: The best all-in-one portable projector is the one that makes all the right compromises. It needs to balance image and sound quality with battery life and responsiveness in a device that's not too expensive and small enough to take anywhere. TCL's fun little PlayCube delivers the right mix to justify paying $800 for a 1080p […]

item.title: MSI MEG X : cet écran OLED vous aide à tricher dans vos jeux avec une panoplie de fonctions indétectables
item.description: Avec son nouveau MEG X, MSI ne se contente pas de proposer une dalle performante : il intègre un processeur dédié pour assister directement les joueurs, quitte à flirter avec les limites de l'équité sportive.

item.title: Got a new Apple Watch? Here are 3 hidden features you're probably not using (but should be)
item.description: 3 secret Apple Watch features you probably didn't know about, from Nightstand Mode to offline navigation.

item.title: Arnaque au Pass Navigo : ce faux mail de la SNCF est redoutable
item.description: Une nouvelle arnaque usurpant l’identité de la SNCF vise les Français. L'escroquerie repose sur l'envoi d'un faux concours organisé par la SNCF, avec la clé un Pass Navigo gratuit. La campagne de phishing vise à collecter une foule de données, dont vos coordonnées bancaires.

item.title: Musk wants up to $134B in OpenAI lawsuit, despite $700B fortune
item.description: Musk's legal team argues he should be compensated as an early startup investor who sees returns "many orders of magnitude greater" than his initial investment.
